artist: Designer: Lurelle Van Arsdale Guild; Designer: After a design by George C. Gebelein; Manufacturer: Chase Brass and Copper Company, Waterbury, Connecticut, founded 1837
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Bob Ulrich and Jill Dahlin
description: circular plate with off-center raised circle on bottom; wedge shaped handle on one side with parallel incised lines; original box and silk bag included
markings: stamped, on bottom of handle: [PAT.1,544,972/(centaur shooting an arrow)/CHASE/USA]
title: Individual canapé plate
